conversation.content: Good afternoon. I need to discuss an unauthorized rate increase on my account that appeared on this month's bill.
Good afternoon, and thank you for calling. I'll be happy to review your account and investigate this rate change. May I please have your account number to get started?
It's 4829-7761-0043. This needs to be resolved today as I'm processing quarterly budgets.
Thank you. I have your account 4829-7761-0043 pulled up now, showing you've been with us since March 2021. I can see there was a rate adjustment on your October 15th billing cycle.
I never received any notification about this increase. My contract specifies thirty days advance notice.
I understand your concern, and you're absolutely right about the notification requirement. Let me check your notification history in our system CRM-7742 to see what correspondence was sent and when.
Please do. This is a twenty-eight percent increase, which significantly impacts our operating costs.

I see the issue now. Our system shows a notification was queued for dispatch on September 14th with reference number NTF-89234-QR, but there's a delivery failure flag on your account's email settings.
That's concerning. We haven't changed our contact information and receive all other correspondence without issue.

You're correct to be concerned. I can see all your invoices and service updates have been successfully delivered to the email address ending in -corp.com, but this specific rate notification encountered an error code E-7749.
What does that mean exactly, and more importantly, how do we fix this situation?
Certainly.
I need this rate reversed until proper notice is given. When can that be processed?

I completely understand, and given the notification failure on our end, that's a reasonable request. I'm escalating this to our billing adjustment team under case number ADJ-5521-KMP for expedited review within two business days.
Two business days is acceptable. Will the rate be reversed retroactively to October fifteenth?
Yes, I'm adding that specific request to your case. The adjustment will backdate to October 15th, crediting the difference of $347.82 to your account once approved by the billing team.
Perfect. Please send me written confirmation of this case and the expected resolution timeline.
Of course.
Thank you for handling this efficiently. I'll watch for that confirmation and the case updates.

You're very welcome. I've documented everything in case ADJ-5521-KMP and added priority status due to the notification error. You'll receive the confirmation within the hour, and I'll personally monitor this to ensure it's resolved properly.

scenario: wanting to know why their rate increased without notice
